thread.title: Adorable kids sitting courtside sang ‘Happy Birthday’ to Steph Curry
thread.title_full: Adorable kids sitting courtside sang ‘Happy Birthday’ to Steph Curry

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Adorable kids sitting courtside sang ‘Happy Birthday’ to Steph Curry
text:
This was neat.
Stephen Curry’s birthday is Tuesday! The 2-time MVP turned 29 years old, and the Golden State Warriors are set to take on the Philadelphia 76ers at home.
While he was warming up, some awesome kids on the sideline decided to sing “Happy Birthday” to him:
The kids sitting courtside were all just singing Happy Birthday to Steph Curry pic.twitter.com/AAPGjCIPC6 
— Sam Hustis (@SamHustis) March 15, 2017 Surely that’s not the first or last time Steph’s going to have “Happy Birthday” sung to him, but it’s pretty neat the kids decided to do that.
Playing the Sixers seems like a pretty nice gift, too.
